name: Chippy (itch)
description:
NOTICE: This game contains flashing lights!

Chippy is essentially a 3D avoidance game, with borrowed elements from well-renowned games such as Just Beats & Shapes, and Sound dodger! 

Featuring a reasonable selection of powerups, an upgrades system, and various accessibility options to make this as friendly as possible to all types of players, whether you're casual or not!

If you wanna have a look at the source files, feel free to visit the GitHub repository!
